title: DRAFT - FA Metadata v2.0 (NOT FOR PRODUCTION USE)
description: ⚠️ WARNING: This is a DRAFT schema with breaking changes. Use v1.1 for production. This v2-draft contains property naming changes (camelCase) that are NOT backward compatible with v1.x.
